description:
***** Listed as Must Have App under SOCIAL category in Pivot (Jan / Feb 2012) *****

Touch Surf is an app for browsing the internet with a Touch, it helps you to bookmark and manage your favorite web pages. It has a collection of major websites in following categories: Social Networks, Messaging, Email, Photos, Movies & Videos, News, Banking, Business & Finance, Sports, Weather, Search & Reference, Technology, etc... 

Watch YouTube Video for more details.

Features: 

  Add / Delete Categories 
  Add / Delete Websites 
  Reorder Categories and Sites 
  Add and Manage favorite websites 
  Bookmark current web page
  E-mail a web page
  Back / Forward navigation for websites 
  Refresh a web page
  Send sites out to Browser 
  Open Site Links in New Window
  Copy Link URL to Clipboard
  User select-able Category / Site Icons List
  Download images from different sites
  Toggle Full Screen mode
  Bookmark local images / files using file:// url 


### New in v2.3.0 ###

  Address bar added with toggle button
  Edit existing Sites
  Edit existing Categories


Consider providing a review, if you like the app. 

Note: Before leaving a negative review, please contact me via email option provided within app, I am here to help :)
versionNote:
+ Address bar added with toggle button
+ Edit existing Sites
+ Edit existing Categories
